CQ500p_INS_00001.instruction: You are an AI assistant specialized in radiology topics. You are provided with brain CT slices from a single study. The number of slices is 24. Please generate medical descriptions based on the images in a consistent style. Use the following guidelines: - Degree: Indicate the intensity or state (e.g., normal, mild, chronic, old, etc). - Landmark: Specify the area of interest (e.g., intracerebral, midline, parenchyma, sulci, etc). - Feature: Describe any observed abnormalities (e.g., hemorrhage, atrophy, infarcts, etc). - Impression: Conclude with a clinical impression (e.g., arteriosclerotic encephalopathy, intracerebral hemorrhage, dementia, etc). Ensure consistency and clarity in the report.
